item.title: Quinoa Salad
item.description: Difficulty: very easy Time: 25 mins Ingredients (6 persons): Quinoa (500g) Kale (80g) 4 apples Sweet peppers (300g) 5 spring onions Canned chickpeas (240g) Cranberries (150g) walnut to taste Seasoning: 1 lemon Mustard (1 full tsp) White Vinegar (2 tsp) Balsamic Vinegar (1 tsp) Hemp oil (2 tsp) Instructions: Cook the quinoa in vegetable stock. Wash and cut the sweet peppers, apples, spring onions and kale in small pieces.
